text:
Abot | Full-Stack Engineer | Venice, CA | ONSITE | https://www.abotlabs.com

Abot automates customer service for eCommerce companies using machine learning. We integrate directly into existing tools and work out-of-the-box with a 15-minute setup.

  * Early stage company with experienced founding team
  * You'll work directly with the CEO/CTO as first engineering hire
  * Golang stack we're proud of, very little technical debt
  * Our office is steps from the beach
Experience with Go is strongly preferred. Let's build some amazing technology and have fun doing it.

Shoot me an email with a link to a project that you built or are excited about: evan @ abotlabs.com.
